QuestData.Title: Lithic's Gift
QuestData.Description: <Kurekk squints at the bangle, rotating it slowly in his claws.>$B$BThere is an inscription on the inside.$B$B"To my father, may Rukhmar illuminate your path. With love, Lithic."$B$BIt cannot be... This is Terokk's bangle! It was a gift from his daughter, he wore it for years until...$B$BWell, we had better return it.$B$BTerokk built a memorial to Lithic not far from Talon Watch. It should rest there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Scuffed Bangle to Lithic's Rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Who... are you? Why have you stirred me?
QuestData.RewardText: That bracelet... I made it for father long ago.$B$BBefore the fall...
